item.title: What I Gained From the 2022 APAC HPC-AI Competition
item.description: The 2022 APAC HPC AI Competition have just finished, which took 7 months from the beginning training to the final presentation.

item.title: PyTorch RNN Tutorial
item.description: This tutorial will demonstrate how to build and train a simple RNN model with PyTorch.
